Reviews.Title: External Camera Enclosure
Reviews.Author: S. Bains "singh"
Reviews.Content: Very sturdy external camera enclosureWell builtNice SizeScrews not included and glass reflects back infra red camera leds at night - took off one star for thatIf your looking for a waterproof enclosure this is goodWould get 5 stars if glass did not reflect back infra red led lights1/9/12 Update- I removed the glass to stop the reflection of infra red sensors, now works greatSince I have the camera tilted down, no water gets in, my camera is big enough that no birds can nest in there also!Just need to watch for bugs now or cob websWorth the purchase just to ruggedize external cameras that are not waterproof

Reviews.Title: IR Cameras-Night Vision Modification
Reviews.Author: Rick   "Communications Tech"
Reviews.Content: I am installing (3) oudoor bullet cameras w/IR (night vision). The cameras are large 245x82x165mm (includes bracket). Although my cameras are rated for outdoor use I wanted to provide extra protection against vandalism.The enclosures are light weight aluminum (not cast or steel). This enclosure works well for my application. My cameras are mounted 15ft-20ft off the ground. I installed my bullet cameras by disassembling the mounting bracket of the camera and leaving the entire assembly inside the enclosure. I secured the camera to the mounting plate of the enclosure. The mounting plate snaps out for easy access. This enclosure has an abundance of working space.In order for my IR (night vision) to work properly, I had to remove the front glass window of the enclosure. Be very careful when removing the glass window, it will splinter. Note: Cameras with IR (night vision) will reflect back at the camera lens if the protective window of the enclosure is not removed. This essentially disables your cameras ability to operate properly at night. Also, if your application is outdoor, use an outdoor rated camera when using this enclosure.I hope you find this information useful.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera Mounting Device
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: Have used these before.  always get them thru amazon.  Great price and fast delivery.  Fits all cameras I use.I use these mounts for cameras without IR and they fit the bill for durability and ease of installation.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Robert Swindell "digital man"
Reviews.Content: I only just received this enclosure/mount, but I have to say: I'm impressed. The size and construction are professional and the mount is solid (all metal). I'm not seeing any glare issues with the plexiglass (no IR in use).Pros:- Quality materials and construction- Professional/intimidating appearance (not cheesy or fake looking)- Well-sealed against moisture- Easy access to internals for installing and servicing the camera- Retail boxCons:- Cable access is too small for USB-A female plug- Does not include mounting bolts (supply your own)- No instructions included (not that they're really needed)I just placed an order for another one.

Reviews.Title: Vitek VT-EH10 Indoor/Outdoor Camera Enclosure
Reviews.Author: JY
Reviews.Content: This enclosure is built to last. It's huge though. I put a tiny IP camera in it and I really don't need all that space.One thing I did not like is that the pass-through hole for the cable is not big enough to accommodate an RJ45 cable. That's not very convenient for PoE IP cameras. However, it is plastic, so it's not difficult to make that hole slightly bigger.All in all, a good product that's a little overkill for my application.

Reviews.Title: Good construction. Works well.
Reviews.Author: E. Lee
Reviews.Content: I have 3 of these so far. I have a business and had a couple of bullet cams out front. Well these thieves would run up with a ladder and pull the cameras and be gone. After installing the cams in the housing, they don't bother messing with em. It's quite the bonus. And Amazon seems to have the best price and shipping. Oh, make sure to get the wall mount too.

Reviews.Title: Well constructed
Reviews.Author: Corbeaux
Reviews.Content: I use it with an Axis 211a network camera, it fits with lots of room to spare. There're some gaskets on the rim which allow for a tight seal. The biggest hazard to this fixture seems to be the local spiders which love to make their webs right in front the glass. I dust them off with a cobweb broom every couple months.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: P.B.
Reviews.Content: I have been using Vitek equipment for a while now and have never had any issues with their products. The quality of these enclosures is excellent and I have no doubt they will protect my box cams from the elements.

Reviews.Title: Good Investment For Your Outdoor Security Cameras
Reviews.Author: Nature's Secret Weapon
Reviews.Content: Even outdoor rated security cameras last much longer with this well built housing.  The only significant drawback is that it prevents night vision from operating unless the glass lens is removed. I use 6 of these for my outdoor security system outside of my home. Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Vitek VT-EH10 Indoor/Outdoor Enclosure
Reviews.Author: Radio Man "Sparks"
Reviews.Content: For our application, these units get a five star rating. Very lightweight and easy to install.We ordered additional housings after installing the first one.For cameras with IR illumination, the glass may have to be removed or replaced with something more compatible.

Reviews.Title: Heavy duty. Works great.
Reviews.Author: Brad L. Carelli
Reviews.Content: This camera inclosure is heavy duty and pretty much water proof.  It has a place for a pad lock so that the camera inclosure can only be opened by an authorized person.  It has a glass in the front.  This will be a problem if your cameras have night vision.  The night vision reflects in the glass causing a glare.  The glass can be removed easily to alleviate this problem.  Over all this is a great product if you are looking for a sturdy and secure inclosure for a security camera.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: MarkyMark
Reviews.Content: Good price. Seems sturdy. Be aware that there is no mounting hardware included. This is the second one I have ordered.

Reviews.Title: Nice, sturdy camera mount
Reviews.Author: David Alexander
Reviews.Content: I've put two of these in place on the outside walls of a building in a fairly harsh winter environment. I put Q-see cameras inside them, which were fairly easy to mount on the internal rail. They haven't had any problems in any weather conditions so far. The only issue I've had is getting the power and coax video cords through the little grommet in the bottom. It was a tight fit, but I was eventually able to force them through. I'm not sure how well something like an RJ-45 cable would fit through there, although you could just thread the cable through and crimp an end onto it afterwards.The mount itself is nice looking and very sturdy. It looks much more imposing than the actual camera inside does.

Reviews.Title: Housing for Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark A. avery
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality, quick shipping. My camera(s) have night vision, so they cast a dim light forward. The only modification I had to make was to remove the glass from the front opening, otherwise the reflection of the night vision light reflected back distorting the picture on the monitor. Since (1) The housing is mounted angled down like in the picture (2)The top portion of the housing has some overhang (3) We live in the desert, I don't foresee a problem with water getting to the camera.

Reviews.Title: OUTDOOR CAMERA ENCLOSURE
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: A little too big for my needs.  Wanted to mount a Panasonic IP camera which is square (not length wise). the camera would not fit the dimensions of the window. Sent it back and bought a DOME housing.HOWEVER, this camera was a good buy for the quality and the fact that it included the housing AND the mount.  Quality built.  looks just like the ones you see in commercial applications.

Reviews.Title: It worked
Reviews.Author: William Britton
Reviews.Content: There was no documentation on this device's suitability for use with a wireless camera.  I had a older airlink camera that i needed to protect from the elements if used.  I was happy to find out that my network was able to receive a signal.  In short it works

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Samuel T. Darnell Jr. "doveTouch"
Reviews.Content: I have used this to mount an external camera at my business location. Nice quality - seems water tight - it worked excellent to house our camera

Reviews.Title: Weather case does great job
Reviews.Author: William C. Hast II
Reviews.Content: I installed a networked HD camera in this case, does quite well protecting the camera from the weather, will purchase more as camera demands increase.

Reviews.Title: External Enclosure
Reviews.Author: SecurityGuy
Reviews.Content: Perfect enclosure for housing various lines of IP cameras. This fit my need perfectly.  The housing is sturdy and rugged, and stood up to me accidentally dropping it twice while I was initially trying to mount it 10 feet off the ground.  There are several others being sold for twice as much, so for the price you cant beat this product.

Reviews.Title: DOES THE JOB
Reviews.Author: DAVID A CAVALLARO
Reviews.Content: The price was excellent. I work for a distibutor and the cost of this was lower then factory price. Different brand of course.I hope this saves you some money

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: Roboguy "comet"
Reviews.Content: Great size that fits all Cam's that I have used. I looked around for a cheap case and this gets the job done. It doesn't feel cheap and comes with everything except the screws to mount it to a wall with.

Reviews.Title: Not too big or too small, it is precisely look good
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: This is the protector equipment for the "monitor camera" I like,it keep the camera in the save place in winter or summer time, the construction precisely good, not too small or even not too big, it was made from the good materials too, I like this product soo much, after the first installation, I re-order for the second one to install on my back yard, thanks for Amazon to provide this product, as I search this camera protector from store to store for long time with the expensive and too big one, at last I found it at Amazon with the reasonable price and I am really satisfied in order to protect my home 24/7 beside to protect the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Heavy-Duty Beige Aluminum Construction
Adjustable Camera Tray & Lockable Rear Latch
Top Swings Open For Ease In Servicing
Tamper Resistant Mounting Screws
Adjustable Pan & Tilt Head
ProductInfo.Name: Vitek VT-EH10 Indoor/Outdoor Camera Enclosure and Wall Mount Combo (Beige)
